type CosmosManyToManyJoinEntityTypeConvention = class inherit ManyToManyJoinEntityTypeConvention interface IEntityTypeAnnotationChangedConvention interface IConvention

Docs.summary: A convention that creates a join entity type for a many-to-many relationship and adds a partition key to it if the related types share one.
Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions, and Accessing Azure Cosmos DB with EF Core for more information and examples.
